GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
perf/x86/intel/uncore: Fix reference count leak in __uncore_imc_init_box()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 0afcb759f6f61192f79dbd6264cb077b088718c2, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit fdb64822443ec9fb8c3a74b598a74790ae8d2e22. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: perf/x86/intel/uncore: Fix reference count leak in __uncore_imc_init_box()
